LanguageData.AF_Armor_T.label: Ferian Seeker-Armor
LanguageData.AF_Armor_T.description: May never be included in the official system of the armor, from the edge of the world struggling to survive the Ferian. \nThe armor was light enough and very strong. It's [SHIELD] was powered by three large Sydaily crystals inside and outside, and destroy any threatening element【Under 160 Damage】. Equip with 【Ferian Seeker-Helmet】.
